verses.verse: וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֛ק <WH2388> was strengthened שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> And Solomon בֶן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David עַל־ <WH5921> over מַלְכוּת֑וֹ <WH4438> in his kingdom וַיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֙ <WH430> his God עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וַֽיְגַדְּלֵ֖הוּ <WH1431> [was] with him and magnified לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> him exceedingly

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Then Solomon לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> unto all Israel לְשָׂרֵי֩ <WH8269> to the captains הָאֲלָפִ֨ים <WH505> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֜וֹת <WH3967> and of hundreds וְלַשֹּֽׁפְטִ֗ים <WH8199> and to the judges וּלְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> every נָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> and to every governor לְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in all Israel רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> the chief הָאָבֽוֹת׃ <WH1> of the fathers

וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> went שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> So Solomon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַקָּהָ֣ל <WH6951> and all the congregation עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with לַבָּמָ֖ה <WH1116> to the high place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּגִבְע֑וֹן <WH1391> that [was] at Gibeon כִּי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> was there הָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> for there was the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> had made מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

אֲבָ֗ל <WH61> But אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God הֶעֱלָ֤ה <WH5927> brought up דָוִיד֙ <WH1732> had David מִקִּרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <WH7157> from Kirjathjearim בַּֽהֵכִ֥ין <WH3559> had prepared ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> to [the place which] David כִּ֧י <WH3588> for נָֽטָה־ <WH5186> for it for he had pitched ל֛וֹ אֹ֖הֶל <WH168> a tent בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> for it at Jerusalem

וּמִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> altar הַנְּחֹ֗שֶׁת <WH5178> Moreover the brasen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> had made בְּצַלְאֵל֙ <WH1212> that Bezaleel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּרִ֣י <WH221> of Uri בֶן־ <WH1121> the son ח֔וּר <WH2354> of Hur שָׂ֕ם <WH7760> he put לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> the tabernacle יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּדְרְשֵׁ֥הוּ <WH1875> sought שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> and Solomon וְהַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> and the congregation

וַיַּעַל֩ <WH5927> went up שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <WH8010> And Solomon שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> and מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> altar הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> thither to the brasen לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לְאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> which [was] at the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַיַּ֧עַל <WH5927> and offered עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> a thousand

בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> In that night הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> appear אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> did God לִשְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> unto Solomon וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֔וֹ שְׁאַ֖ל <WH7592> unto him Ask מָ֥ה <WH4100> what אֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> what I shall give לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> And Solomon לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto God אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> You עָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> Thou hast shewed עִם־ <WH5973> with דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> unto David אָבִ֖י <WH1> my father חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> mercy גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> great וְהִמְלַכְתַּ֖נִי <WH4427> and hast made me to reign תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God יֵֽאָמֵן֙ <WH539> be established דְּבָ֣רְךָ֔ <WH1697> let thy promise עִ֖ם <WH5973> with דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> unto David אָבִ֑י <WH1> my father כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You הִמְלַכְתַּ֔נִי <WH4427> for thou hast made me king עַל־ <WH5921> over עַ֕ם <WH5971> over a people רַ֖ב <WH7227> in multitude כַּעֲפַ֥ר <WH6083> like the dust הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now חָכְמָ֤ה <WH2451> me now wisdom וּמַדָּע֙ <WH4093> and knowledge תֶּן־ <WH5414> Give לִ֔י וְאֵֽצְאָ֛ה <WH3318> that I may go out לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְאָב֑וֹאָה <WH935> and come in כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִ֣י <WH4310> who יִשְׁפֹּ֔ט <WH8199> for who can judge אֶת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֥ <WH5971> this thy people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> great ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר־ <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֣ים ׀ <WH430> And God לִשְׁלֹמֹ֡ה <WH8010> to Solomon יַ֣עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> had זֹ֜את <WH2063> likewise עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָבֶ֗ךָ <WH3824> Because this was in thine heart וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁ֠אַלְתָּ <WH7592> and thou hast not asked עֹ֣שֶׁר <WH6239> riches נְכָסִ֤ים <WH5233> wealth וְכָבוֹד֙ <WH3519> or honour וְאֵת֙ <WH853> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> nor the life שֹׂנְאֶ֔יךָ <WH8130> of thine enemies וְגַם־ <WH1571> even יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> life רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> long לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שָׁאָ֑לְתָּ <WH7592> neither yet hast asked וַתִּֽשְׁאַל־ <WH7592> but hast asked לְךָ֙ חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> wisdom וּמַדָּ֔ע <WH4093> and knowledge אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom תִּשְׁפּוֹט֙ <WH8199> for thyself that thou mayest judge אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> my people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הִמְלַכְתִּ֖יךָ <WH4427> over whom I have made thee king עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> over

הַֽחָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> Wisdom וְהַמַּדָּ֖ע <WH4093> and knowledge נָת֣וּן <WH5414> [is] granted לָ֑ךְ וְעֹ֨שֶׁר <WH6239> thee riches וּנְכָסִ֤ים <WH5233> and wealth וְכָבוֹד֙ <WH3519> and honour אֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> unto thee and I will give לָ֔ךְ אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> none הָ֣יָה <WH1961> become כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that לַמְּלָכִים֙ <WH4428> such as none of the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> have had that [have been] before וְאַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> thee neither shall there any after לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> after that

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Then Solomon לַבָּמָ֤ה <WH1116> [from his journey] to the high place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בְּגִבְעוֹן֙ <WH1391> that [was] at Gibeon יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> from before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel פ

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <WH622> gathered שְׁלֹמֹה֮ <WH8010> And Solomon רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> chariots וּפָרָשִׁים֒ <WH6571> and horsemen וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become ל֗וֹ אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> and he had a thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> and four מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred רֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> chariots וּשְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> horsemen וַיַּנִּיחֵם֙ <WH3240> which he placed בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> in the chariot וְעִם־ <WH5973> and with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and with the king בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> at Jerusalem

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> made הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֧סֶף <WH3701> silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֛ב <WH2091> and gold בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem כָּאֲבָנִ֑ים <WH68> [as plenteous] as stones וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> הָאֲרָזִ֗ים <WH730> and cedar trees נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> made כַּשִּׁקְמִ֥ים <WH8256> he as the sycomore trees אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> it בַּשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <WH8219> that [are] in the vale לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for abundance

וּמוֹצָ֧א <WH4161> brought הַסּוּסִ֛ים <WH5483> had horses אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לִשְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> And Solomon מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וּמִקְוֵ֕א <WH4723> and linen yarn סֹחֲרֵ֣י <WH5503> merchants הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's מִקְוֵ֥א <WH4723> the linen yarn יִקְח֖וּ <WH3947> received בִּמְחִֽיר׃ <WH4242> at a price

וַֽ֠יַּעֲלוּ <WH5927> And they fetched up וַיּוֹצִ֨יאוּ <WH3318> and brought forth מִמִּצְרַ֤יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt מֶרְכָּבָה֙ <WH4818> a chariot בְּשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> for six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [shekels] of silver וְס֖וּס <WH5483> and an horse בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמֵאָ֑ה <WH3967> for an hundred וְ֠כֵן <WH3651> the same לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all מַלְכֵ֧י <WH4428> [horses] for all the kings הַֽחִתִּ֛ים <WH2850> of the Hittites וּמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> and for the kings אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of Syria בְּיָדָ֥ם <WH3027> by their means יוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <WH3318> and so brought they out
